definitions.title: n.pr.loc. 1.
definitions.body: abode of Amorites, [[בְּהַר־חֶרֶם בְּאַיׇּלוֹן וּבְשַׁעַלְבִַים]] Ju Jdg 1:35, since [[חֶרֶס]] sun = [[שֶׁמֶשׁ]], perh. = [[בֵּית שֶׁמֶשׁ]]
(q.v.), so Stu (who prop. [[עִיר חֶרֶס]] = [[עָר]]), Ke Be Bu:RS 17 Öt Bla; LXX e)n tw=| [u)/rei tou=] Mursinw=ni(-ov) = [[הַר הֲדַס]].

place E. of Jordan [[מִלְמַעֲלֵה הֶחָָרֶס]] Ju Jdg 8:13 from the ascent of Ḥeres, LXX Arev; the point whence Gideon turned back from pursuing Midian; Aq Symm rd. [[הֶהָרִים]] (v. Lag:Onom. 96, 2nd ed. 131) so SS.—[[תִּמְנַת־חֶרֶס]] Ju Jdg 2:9 v. sub [[תִּמְנַת ]], √ [[מנה]].
